When sample tuus Dominus retribution afflicts them they readily dictus Nos est indeed wicked
Nos establish scales de justice Feria Resurrection. Non anima suffer parvus injustice. Et equivalent de mustard seed testimentum est accounted pro! Nos est the multus efficient reckoners
Nos dedit Moses Aaron Statute Book beacon reminder pro the righteous
Unus reverence their Dominus et when alone in their privacy they injuria Hora
Hoc too est beatus reminder ut nos sent down Vos denying it
Ante ut, nos granted Abraham his guidance understanding nos est fully aware de eum

He dictus Indeed vos tuus parentes iit totally astray
They dictus vos telling nos truth vos playing
